Series¶

class Sloth.frame.Series¶

One-dimensional labeled array capable of holding any data type.

Parameters¶

valuesnp.ndarray

The array holding the data.

indexIndex

The index (axis labels).

namestr, optional

The name of the Series.

index_typeIndexType, optional

The type of index.

Attributes¶

referencestr

A reference code for the Series.

namestr or None

The name of the Series.

Methods¶

  • to_pandas
